head.supplied: ¶ [From Baron von Müller undertaking to subscribe £10.0.0 to the New Guinea Exploration Fund and to Examine and report upon all plant collections which may be made by the Society in that region]...

div.p: ML MSS.774/1 General and Administrative Council minute book, Royal Geographical Society of Australasia (NSW Branch) papers, Mitchell Library, Sydney.

Letter not found; item is an entry in the minutes of a meeting of the Council of the NSW Branch of the Geographical Society of Australasia held on 15 October 1883. The report continues: ' It was directed that the offer be accepted with thanks'. The date of M's letter is given in the reply, R. Martin to M, 19 November 1883.
[From Baron von Müller undertaking to subscribe £10.0.0 to the New Guinea Exploration Fund and to Examine and report upon all plant collections which may be made by the Society in that region]
